Class PacketDecoder

java.lang.Object
PacketDecoder
public class PacketDecoder extends Object
Packet decoding class. Contains relevant utilites and packet parsing logic.

    int
    carvePayload(LiteralValuePacket packet)
    Carve payload from packets data field Explanation: -payload is segmented in groups -each group is composed of NR_BITS_PAYLOAD_GROUP bits -the first bit indicates if the current group is the last and the 4 last correspond to the payload Format: LPPPP | L = 0 if last group, 1 if not P=payload bit Example: 1100 1001 1010 0110

    • binaryToPacket

      public Packet binaryToPacket(String binary) throws InvalidPacketTypeException
      Encapsulate Packet from binary data
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      encapsulated packet
      Throws:
      InvalidPacketTypeException - Invalid type of packet exception

    • carvePayload

      public int carvePayload(LiteralValuePacket packet)
      Carve payload from packets data field Explanation: -payload is segmented in groups -each group is composed of NR_BITS_PAYLOAD_GROUP bits -the first bit indicates if the current group is the last and the 4 last correspond to the payload Format: LPPPP | L = 0 if last group, 1 if not P=payload bit Example: 1100 1001 1010 0110
      Parameters:
      packet - Literal Value Packet
      Returns:
      carved payload in decimal form

    • carveConsecutivePackets

      public ArrayList<Packet> carveConsecutivePackets(String consecutivePacketsBinary, int nrPackets) throws InvalidPacketTypeException
      extracts consecutive sub-packets from an operation packet
      Parameters:
      consecutivePacketsBinary - binary string with all sub-packets
      nrPackets - number of sub-packets in main packet
      Returns:
      ArrayList with all sub-packets
      Throws:
      InvalidPacketTypeException - Invalid type of packet exception

    • findUncarvedPayloadLength

      private int findUncarvedPayloadLength(String payloadBinary)
      Find length of a packets data including group bits
      Parameters:
      payloadBinary - packet data in binary form
      Returns:
      length of packet data including group bits

    • findPacketLength

      private int findPacketLength(String consecutivePacketsBinary) throws InvalidPacketTypeException
      Find length of the first packet in consecutivePacketsBinary recursively Note: length includes nested packets
      Parameters:
      consecutivePacketsBinary - consecutive packets in binary form
      Returns:
      length of first packet in consecutivePacketsBinary
      Throws:
